p: The first step to proceed with the multivariate time-series analysis is by checking that the series to be considered are stationary. Using the Dickey-Fuller test applied for each of the series of confirmed and discarded cases of dengue, chikungunya and Zika, the results shows the series are stationary after one differentiation (all presenting p-values < 0.005). S1 Table shows a summary of the results of the applied test to the considered six series before and after differentiation.
